front.title: Extensions to Path Computation Element Communication Protocol (PCEP) for handling Link Bandwidth Utilization

abstract.t: The Path Computation Element Communication Protocol (PCEP) provides mechanisms for Path Computation Elements (PCEs) to perform path computations in response to Path Computation Clients (PCCs) requests. Link bandwidth utilization considering the total bandwidth of a link in current use for the forwarding is an important factor to consider during path computation. This document describes extensions to PCEP to consider them as new constraints during path computation.
